title: S6: How to make the European Green Deal work (Part Two)
description: Don't worry if you missed part one because all of Bruegel's pillars for a European Green Deal are created equal. This time, Nicholas Barrett and Guntram Wolff discuss industrial policy and the social consequences of the green deal with Grégory Claeys and Simone Tagliapietra. To read the paper in full, visit Bruegel.org
itunes:author: Bruegel
dc:creator: Bruegel
